scripts.generate-sdk:local: npm run clean:api-sdk && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-angular -i http://localhost:9090/v3/api-docs -o ./sdk/lga-api-sdk --additional-properties npmName=lga-api-sdk,snapshot=true,ngVersion=9.0.1,fileNaming=kebab-case,npmVersion=1.0.0,useSingleRequestParameter=true --type-mappings=DateTime=string
scripts.generate-sdk:staging: npm run clean:api-sdk && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-angular -i http://41.207.248.189:5010/v3/api-docs -o ./sdk/lga-api-sdk --additional-properties npmName=lga-api-sdk,snapshot=true,ngVersion=9.0.1,fileNaming=kebab-case,npmVersion=1.0.0,useSingleRequestParameter=true --type-mappings=DateTime=string
scripts.generate-sdk:prod: npm run clean:api-sdk && openapi-generator-cli generate -g typescript-angular -i https://ivasapp.services.an.gov.ng/ivasapp/v3/api-docs -o ./sdk/lga-api-sdk --additional-properties npmName=lga-api-sdk,snapshot=true,ngVersion=9.0.1,fileNaming=kebab-case,npmVersion=1.0.0,useSingleRequestParameter=true --type-mappings=DateTime=string
